summary.para: Contains interfaces and classes that implement EasyTest functionality.
Stores options for a tested Blazor application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified settings.

member.param: Specifies a path to the folder that contains the application.
Specifies a configuration to use for running tests.
Specifies whether the test ignores a letter case when referring to UI element names, captions, or tags.
Specifies a web browser used to run tests. Available values: Chrome, Edge.
Specifies the command-line arguments passed to the application when it is started.
Specifies a path to a web driver. Not required when a path to a web driver is added to a system PATH variable.
Specifies a path to the web browser application. Used when running tests in a portable browser.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.Arguments

summary.para: Specifies the command-line arguments passed to the application when it is started.

member.value: The command-line arguments passed to the application when it is started.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.Browser

summary.para: Returns a web browser used for running tests. Available values: Chrome, Edge. The default value is Edge.

member.value: A web browser used for running tests (Chrome or Edge).

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.BrowserBinaryPath

summary.para: Returns a path to a web browser application.

member.value: A path to the web browser application.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.Configuration

summary.para: Returns a configuration to use for running tests.

member.value: A configuration used to run tests.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.IgnoreCase

summary.para: Gets whether the test ignores a letter case when referring to UI element names, captions, or tags.

member.value: true, if a test ignores a letter case in UI elements; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Gets the name of the Blazor application. This name is used to differentiate between different applications.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.PhysicalPath

summary.para: Gets a path to the folder that contains the application.

member.value: A path to the folder that contains the application.

member.name: P:DevExpress.EasyTest.Framework.BlazorApplicationOptions.WebDriverPath

summary.para: Gets a path to a folder that stores a web driver executable.

member.value: A path to a web driver.
